name: Skeleton War
description:
Players will face a raging skeleton army, through flexible and resourceful decision-making construction, with agile and athletic positioning, to deal with a variety of enemy attacks, through the many levels of challenge, and the BOSS narrowly meet, a showdown.

The game philosophy includes simplification of complexity, emergent interaction design, spiraling difficulty curve, and chemical reaction of collision of various elements, aiming to create a unique, fun, simple and enjoyable gaming experience for players.
